name: ColumbiaDining
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: columbia dining
des: Columbia dining skill allows students to get the menus for each dining hall on campus along with the hours. They can ask fo specific stations, when a dining hall is open, if a specific dining hall is open, and what the capacity the dining hall is at that moment. Sample things to say would be "dinner at ferris", "what dining hall is open", "what is the capacity for john jay", "ferris hours".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
